entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
